page.title: 11Kingsway Park,Kirkby
page.content: On Friday,10th May,a group of children did a survey at Kingsway Park, sometimes known as the "Acre".Two children measured the perimeter of the park (about 1000 metres) whilst the other four and the teacher interviewed some park workers.There are many activities for young and old such as football,bowling,tennis,putting and cricket.There are cricket and bowling matches every Saturday in summer. There is an aviary with beautiful birds.There is also a rose garden. At the top of the park is a children's playground with swings,climbing frame, rocket,seesaw,hanging ropes and round- about. The park is maintained by the local council.
